# Hurricane Matthew Heads for Florida
**The Wall Street Journal - World News:** [October 06, 2016](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8QTNVm-VCk)
*  We will likely start to see impacts on our state within the next 24 hours and last through [[00:00:00](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8QTNVm-VCk&t=0.0s)]
*  the weekend. [[00:00:11](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8QTNVm-VCk&t=11.48s)]
*  That means people have less than 24 hours left to prepare, evacuate and shelter. [[00:00:13](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8QTNVm-VCk&t=13.56s)]
*  If you do not leave, you are putting a law enforcement officer or a National Guardsman's [[00:00:26](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8QTNVm-VCk&t=26.2s)]
*  life on the line when they have to go back and get you. [[00:00:30](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8QTNVm-VCk&t=30.04s)]
*  Again, this can kill you and we cannot save you. [[00:00:34](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8QTNVm-VCk&t=34.2s)]
*  We're going to have rip currents. [[00:00:42](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8QTNVm-VCk&t=42.08s)]
*  We're going to have beach erosion. [[00:00:43](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8QTNVm-VCk&t=43.08s)]
*  We have the chance for tornadoes. [[00:00:45](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8QTNVm-VCk&t=45.16s)]
*  And we're going to have hurricane-force winds. [[00:00:47](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=M8QTNVm-VCk&t=47.0s)]
